resources.string: - Poway is where the band Blink182 is from\n- Poway is in San Diego County\n- Poway is where I went to the second grade in elementary school

- Merrimac is where many carriages were made prior to cars\n- Merrimac borders Amesbury to the East and Haverhill to the West. West Newbury is to the South, and multiple New Hampshire towns are in the North.
Where I would like to live: Kauai, Hawaii (but not forever)

- Kauai is the oldest of the main Hawaiian islands\n- I have been to Kauai before and loved my experience there\n- Kauai has many chickens roaming in the wild due to a storm damaging a chicken enclosure in the past.
My girlfriend:\n- Was born in Providence, RI\n- Moved to New Hampshire and Massachusetts when young.

- I moved to Massachusetts when I was 8 years old.
- My favorite holiday is Halloween
- I am a skateboarder
- One of my desires in life is to obtain a SCUBA diving certification.

My Attempt To Make a Resume Using Text Views: a Journey

Something cool I found while playing with Radio Buttons is that if you place them in an array, there is an optical illusion. I\'ve found especially when I\'ve activated all of the buttons that it looks like there are circles in the blank spaces between the radio buttons, floating in nothingness....\n\nAnyways, I just thought this was an interesting interaction!
